name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Customer Engineer with 10+ years of experience in software development and a robust foundation in data management and governance. Skilled in ensuring data quality, privacy, and integration across enterprise architectures, leveraging **data catalog** and **data lakes** to enhance data delivery and accessibility. Proficient with **PaaS providers** and **integration platforms**, my expertise in modern technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** complements my ability to manage projects effectively and deliver customer-focused solutions. I have a proven track record in project management and process management, with strong skills in value-based selling, cost-benefit analysis, and ROI analysis that drive business value. 

My technical proficiencies span the full stack, including **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and I am experienced in building and deploying applications on **Azure** and **AWS**. I bring a unique perspective on developing secure, compliant solutions adhering to standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while championing continuous learning and collaboration. I am dedicated to leveraging my technical knowledge and effective communication skills to drive impactful results.
